marlin.auber.components

Class ActivePlayerCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • marlin.auber.common.Component
      • marlin.auber.components.ActivePlayerCharacter

  • public class ActivePlayerCharacter
extends Component
    A marker component for the active player character. There should only be one of these in the scene.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Timer abilityCooldown
      A Timer for the time inbetween Infiltrator ability uses.
      Timer abilityDuration
      A Timer for the duration of Infiltrator ability uses.
      Timer beamTime
      A Timer for when the player is arresting an NPC.
      Timer eventCooldown
      A Timer for the time inbetween Infiltrator attacks.
      Timer healCooldown
      A Timer for when the player can heal.
      Timer keypadTime
      A Timer for when the player is fixing a keypad.
      Timer meltdownTime
      A Timer for how long the player has to save the ship from an attack, if it reaches zero and either an infiltrator hasn't been cuaght, or a keypad is broken, the game will end.
      Timer reload
      A Timer for when the player reloads.
      Timer teleportCooldown
      A Timer for when the player can teleport.

      • Fields inherited from class marlin.auber.common.Component

        parent

      Constructors

      ActivePlayerCharacter() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class marlin.auber.common.Component

    • Field Detail

      • teleportCooldown

        public Timer teleportCooldown
        A Timer for when the player can teleport. If the timer is zero, teleporting is allowed.

      • reload

        public Timer reload
        A Timer for when the player reloads. If the timer is zero, the arrest beam's ammo is refilled.

      • healCooldown

        public Timer healCooldown
        A Timer for when the player can heal. If the timer is zero, healing is allowed.

      • beamTime

        public Timer beamTime
        A Timer for when the player is arresting an NPC. If the timer is zero, the NPC being arrested will be arrested.

      • keypadTime

        public Timer keypadTime
        A Timer for when the player is fixing a keypad. If the timer is zero, the keypad will be fixed.

      • meltdownTime

        public Timer meltdownTime
        A Timer for how long the player has to save the ship from an attack, if it reaches zero and either an infiltrator hasn't been cuaght, or a keypad is broken, the game will end.

      • eventCooldown

        public Timer eventCooldown
        A Timer for the time inbetween Infiltrator attacks.

      • abilityCooldown

        public Timer abilityCooldown
        A Timer for the time inbetween Infiltrator ability uses.

      • abilityDuration

        public Timer abilityDuration
        A Timer for the duration of Infiltrator ability uses.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActivePlayerCharacter

        public ActivePlayerCharacter()
